title: Elon Musk's Cryptic Gun Emoji Post As Joe Biden Speaks On Violence In US
content: Billionaire Elon Musk today made a cryptic gun emoji post on his social media platform X, shortly after President Joe Biden spoke on the rising gun violence in the US.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk today made a cryptic gun emoji post on his social media platform X, shortly after President Joe Biden spoke on the rising gun violence in the US.

title: "Who Does He Think He Is?" Joe Biden Blasts Donald Trump In Fiery Speech
content: In a charged and emotional farewell speech at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, President Joe Biden delivered a scathing critique of former President Donald Trump, labelling him a "loser" and vigorously defending his own legacy.
summary: In a charged and emotional farewell speech at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, President Joe Biden delivered a scathing critique of former President Donald Trump, labelling him a "loser" and vigorously defending his own legacy.

title: Tearful Biden Gets Huge Ovation At Democratic Convention Farewell
content: US President Joe Biden won a huge ovation as he took to the stage Monday at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
summary: US President Joe Biden won a huge ovation as he took to the stage Monday at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Elon Musk's Response After Trump Says He Would Make Him Adviser
content: After US Presidential candidate Donald Trump said that he might consider offering Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk an advisory role within his administration, the latter responded with a social media post that read, "I am willing to serve."
summary: After US Presidential candidate Donald Trump said that he might consider offering Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk an advisory role within his administration, the latter responded with a social media post that read, "I am willing to serve."

title: "Kamala Harris Won't Rest, Trump Slept At His Trial": Hillary Clinton
content: Hillary Clinton, who became the first woman to secure a major US party's presidential nomination, addressed the Democratic convention in Chicago today and praised her party's new presidential nominee Kamala Harris.
summary: Hillary Clinton, who became the first woman to secure a major US party's presidential nomination, addressed the Democratic convention in Chicago today and praised her party's new presidential nominee Kamala Harris.

title: Nothing CEO Ends Work From Home, Suggests Leaving To Those Who Disagree
content: The CEO also advised staff members who were unable to work five days a week to find alternative jobs.
summary: The CEO also advised staff members who were unable to work five days a week to find alternative jobs.

title: Kamala Harris Thanks Biden In Surprise Speech On Day 1 Of Democratic Event
content: US Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamal Harris has thanked US President Joe Biden for his "lifetime of service" to the nation. The Indian-origin leader addressed the opening of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
summary: US Vice President and Democratic nominee Kamal Harris has thanked US President Joe Biden for his "lifetime of service" to the nation. The Indian-origin leader addressed the opening of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Mpox Death Count Crosses 570 As Congo Awaits Vaccines
content: Mpox cases and deaths are rising in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) as the central African country awaits vaccines from the United States and Japan, the health minister said on Monday.
summary: Mpox cases and deaths are rising in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) as the central African country awaits vaccines from the United States and Japan, the health minister said on Monday.

title: Former Congressman George Santos Pleads Guilty To Fraud
content: Disgraced former Republican lawmaker George Santos, who was expelled from the US Congress for using stolen donor cash to bankroll a lavish lifestyle, pleaded guilty on Monday to wire fraud and identity theft.
summary: Disgraced former Republican lawmaker George Santos, who was expelled from the US Congress for using stolen donor cash to bankroll a lavish lifestyle, pleaded guilty on Monday to wire fraud and identity theft.

title: Joe Biden's Son Hunter Loses Bid To Toss Tax Evasion Case
content: A judge on Monday denied a bid by U.S. President Joe Biden's son, Hunter, to dismiss a federal tax evasion case brought against him in California.
summary: A judge on Monday denied a bid by U.S. President Joe Biden's son, Hunter, to dismiss a federal tax evasion case brought against him in California.

title: Trump Says May Appoint Elon Musk As Adviser If He Defeats Kamala Harris
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Monday that if elected he would consider ending a $7,500 tax credit for electric-vehicle purchases and that he would be open to naming Tesla CEO Elon Musk to a cabinet or advisory role.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Monday that if elected he would consider ending a $7,500 tax credit for electric-vehicle purchases and that he would be open to naming Tesla CEO Elon Musk to a cabinet or advisory role.

title: US Intelligence Officials Say Iran Responsible For Trump Campaign Hack
content: US intelligence officials said on Monday that they considered Iran to be responsible for a recent hack of Donald Trump's presidential campaign, according to a statement, adding that it was part of ongoing cyber attacks by Tehran.
summary: US intelligence officials said on Monday that they considered Iran to be responsible for a recent hack of Donald Trump's presidential campaign, according to a statement, adding that it was part of ongoing cyber attacks by Tehran.

title: Pakistan Ex-PM Imran Khan Applies To Be Oxford Chancellor From Jail
content: Pakistan's jailed former prime minister Imran Khan has applied to become the next chancellor of Britain's prestigious University of Oxford, his party said.
summary: Pakistan's jailed former prime minister Imran Khan has applied to become the next chancellor of Britain's prestigious University of Oxford, his party said.

title: Live: "I've Been Determined To Keep America Moving Forward," Says Biden
content: Thousands have gathered in Chicago for the four-day Democratic Convention to show their support for Kamala Harris as officially nominated democratic party candidate for the US presidential polls 2024.
summary: Thousands have gathered in Chicago for the four-day Democratic Convention to show their support for Kamala Harris as officially nominated democratic party candidate for the US presidential polls 2024.

title: "We Don't Need...": Hamas Criticises US' Gaza Truce Deal
content: Hamas senior official Osama Hamdan criticized U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken's statement on Monday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accepted an updated proposal.
summary: Hamas senior official Osama Hamdan criticized U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken's statement on Monday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accepted an updated proposal.

title: Biden To Pass Torch To Kamala Harris At Democratic Convention: 10 Points
content: The 2024 Democratic National Convention will officially declare US Vice President Kamala Harris as its official nomination for the Presidential election today, replacing incumbent Joe Biden, who withdrew from the race last month.
summary: The 2024 Democratic National Convention will officially declare US Vice President Kamala Harris as its official nomination for the Presidential election today, replacing incumbent Joe Biden, who withdrew from the race last month.

title: US Approves $3.5 Billion Sale Of Military Helicopters To South Korea
content: The United States on Monday announced its approval of a $3.5-billion sale to South Korea of up to 36 AH-64E Apache attack helicopters and related equipment, including missiles.
summary: The United States on Monday announced its approval of a $3.5-billion sale to South Korea of up to 36 AH-64E Apache attack helicopters and related equipment, including missiles.

title: Pakistan Confirms Mpox Case Detected Last Week Not New Strain
content: A case of mpox in Pakistan announced last week was not the new strain spreading through Africa, health officials said Monday.
summary: A case of mpox in Pakistan announced last week was not the new strain spreading through Africa, health officials said Monday.

title: As Polio Reemerges In Gaza, A Mother Fears For Her Child's Health
content: In Gaza, a mother worries that her month-old son, Mohammed, could be infected with polio after the Palestinian health ministry confirmed the first case in the enclave on Friday, ending a 25 year period in which the Strip was polio-free.
summary: In Gaza, a mother worries that her month-old son, Mohammed, could be infected with polio after the Palestinian health ministry confirmed the first case in the enclave on Friday, ending a 25 year period in which the Strip was polio-free.

title: Hamas, Islamic Jihad Claim Responsibility For Bomb Blast In Tel Aviv
content: The armed wings of Hamas and Islamic Jihad claimed responsibility on Monday for a bomb blast near a synagogue in Tel Aviv that Israeli police and the Shin Bet intelligence agency described as a terrorist attack.
summary: The armed wings of Hamas and Islamic Jihad claimed responsibility on Monday for a bomb blast near a synagogue in Tel Aviv that Israeli police and the Shin Bet intelligence agency described as a terrorist attack.
